definition: A written record in which personal experiences, thoughts, and feelings are regularly recorded, typically on a daily basis. It serves as a private outlet for self-reflection, documenting one's life events, emotions, and observations.

examples.german: Ich schreibe jeden Tag in mein Tagebuch.
examples.english: I write in my diary every day.
My diary is full of secrets.

examples.german: Er liest gerne Tagebücher berühmter Persönlichkeiten.
examples.english: He enjoys reading diaries of famous personalities.

examples.german: Das Tagebuch ist ein wichtiger Teil meiner Kindheitserinnerungen.
examples.english: The diary is an important part of my childhood memories.
